location.sjis: ルイーズ村 住宅地

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: ヴォイジンという男に 殺されたんじゃ
portrait_l.ascii: Was killed by that man Voijin.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: 最近のお母様は、とにかくすごい 鍛冶師を見つける事だけに 集中してて大変なの
portrait_l.ascii: Lately, my mother has been focused only on finding amazing Craftknights, and it's been tough.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: まったくお金を儲けてきてくれないから 私が稼がないと泊まるとこにも 困っちゃうの
portrait_l.ascii: She isn't earning any money at all. I need to work or we'd have trouble finding a place to stay.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: ところであなたは、鍛冶師みたいだけど 強化の情報を聞いていかない？
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, aren't you a Craftknight? Will you listen to my lecture on enhancments?

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: えっとね、強化で「伝説の青竹」を 使うと特殊効果の「中ヒール」が 武器に付加されるの
portrait_l.ascii: Okay, so. With this Legendary Green Bamboo, you can imbue a weapon with Medium Heal.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: でもって、今回はなんと 「伝説の青竹」を、１５００バームで 販売中なの～
portrait_l.ascii: But wait, there's more! As a special offer, I'm selling it for merely 1500 Boam!

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: ええぇ～これじゃ～ お金たりないの～ 商談不成立だよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Ehh~ What's this~ You don't have enough money~ Negotiations have broken down~

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: え～聞くだけ聞いて買ってくれないの～ ケチ～
portrait_l.ascii: Eh~ You make me explain but aren't buying anything? Cheapskate~

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: え～聞いてくれないの～ せっかくのお客さんだと思ったのに～
portrait_l.ascii: Eh~ You don't want to listen? And I thought I finally had a customer~
